commit.title: [dune] Update to dune language version 2.0
commit.message:
[dune] Update to dune language version 2.0

This is the minimal set of changes requires for Coq to build under 2.0
mode. We may likely take advantage of some more new features.

Note that for the moment Dune 2.0 is not installable for OPAM switches
using a compiler < 4.06.0 ; this should be fixed in the future but it
means that Coq + Dune users should at least use 4.06.0 [I recommend
4.07.1 , but indeed this version also has problems; 4.08.1 does also
work OK however it suffers from a merlin bug due to new modules in the
OCaml stdlib]

commit.message:
[dune] Update to dune language version 2.0

This is the minimal set of changes requires for Coq to build under 2.0
mode. We may likely take advantage of some more new features.

Note that for the moment Dune 2.0 is not installable for OPAM switches
using a compiler < 4.06.0 ; this should be fixed in the future but it
means that Coq + Dune users should at least use 4.06.0 [I recommend
4.07.1 , but indeed this version also has problems; 4.08.1 does also
work OK however it suffers from a merlin bug due to new modules in the
OCaml stdlib]
